A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A good movie. Was a little too risky with its plot\, which didn't make sense in essence\, but the action scenes were good. I liked the introduction of the character Rose. As for Luke Skywalker\, we do see another\, unexpected side of him - a potentially disagreeable side - but I do expect him to come back as a mentor for Rey (who is still a Mary Sue\, but I find it interesting that she comes from a \"Nobody\".) I think it was an okay movie. Better than TFA as a whole in my opinion. The Leia scene was ridiculous\, but maybe they're trying to define the force and what it can do?? It's hard to say. I was disappointed by this installment\, but the middle of a triology normally moves slowly\, and I was pleasently surprised in that aspect.
